title: Finance Technology Stack
text: Money, Accounting, Ledgers, Joint Stock Companies, Markets, Derivatives, Electronic Messaging, Credit Cards, Securitizations, etc. >

title: Customer Interface
text: Credit Cards (1940 - 50s) & Point of Sale Systems (1980s) >
Electronic Payments (1870s), Wires (1910s), ACH (1970s) & Direct Deposits (1970s) >
Banking - Tents, Temples, Bricks & Mortar (4th – 1st millennium BCE) >

title: Funding & Risk Management
text: Interest Rate Futures (1970s) & Interest Rate Swaps (1980s) >
Consumer Finance Companies & Warehouse Lines of Credit (1920s) >
Bankruptcy & Secured Lending Laws, Loan Servicing & Collection Agents (Days of old) >

title: FinTech - Finance’s Fertile Ground
text: Digitalization of Money, Securities and Credit
Wide Public Acceptance of New Tech
Legacy Customer Interface and Processing Systems
Vast and Expanding Amounts of Customer Data
Rapid Expansion of Computational & Analytical Power
Reliance on Multiple Systems of Ledgers
Infrastructure Systems’ Costs and Counterparty Risks
Economic Rents and Centralized Concentrated Risks

title: FinTech – The Actors
text: Big Finance: Like ‘Fortresses’ w/ Moats, Towers & Sovereign Affiliations
'Towers': 1) Payments, 2) Balance Sheets, 3) Data, 4) Corporate Structure
Big Tech DNA Loop (BIS): 1) Data, 2) Networks, 3) Activities
Start-ups: 1) Disruptive Innovators, 2) Flexibility, 3) Asymmetric Risk Takers

title: Open API & Open Banking
text: Open Application Program Interfaces (Open API) allow outside Developers access to and an ability to Integrate Permissioned Customer Data into Third Party Applications
Open Banking initiatives facilitates or mandates Open API for Non-banks to Share Permissioned Bank Customer Data

title: Open API & Open Banking
text: Policy Trade-offs of Promoting Competition & Innovation,
Limiting Cybersecurity Risks, and Maintaining Privacy &
EU Payment System Directive (PSD2), UK Open Banking
Alternatives: Screen Scraping, Reverse Engineering & Robotic

title: FICO Scores
text: Source: 'What's in my FICO Scores?', myFICO, Fair Isaac Corporation

title: Alternative Data
text: • Bank, Checking, Employment, Income, Insurance, Tenant, Utilities
• Educational Background, Employer, Occupation, Work History
• App Usage, Browsing History, Email Receipt, Geolocation, Social Media Data
• Sensor Data - Drones, IoTs, Smartphones, Telematics, & Wearables

title: Blockchain Technology & Cryptocurrencies
text: Nakamoto solved the payments riddle - avoiding double spending
Money is but a social & economic construct
Append-only logs & multiparty consensus provides a peer-2-peer alternative
Can address verification and networking costs
Crypto markets are rife with scams, fraud, hacks & manipulation
Cryptocurrencies have evolved into a speculative asset class
Adoption rests on addressing comparative viability & value proposition
The potential, though, to be a catalyst for change is real

title: Credit & Lending: Market Design
text: - Alternative Data, Credit Scoring, Cross Selling, Marketing & Underwriting
- Balance Sheet, Securitization, or Issuer Bank Partner
- Credit / Default, Market (Basis, Rate, Spread, Volatility), & Prepayment
- Funding, Liquidity, Model, Operational, & Reputational / Compliance
- Brokerage / Origination, Underwriting, Credit Enhancing, Securitizing, Credit Rating, Appraising, Servicing, Collecting / Foreclosing, & Funding

title: Pay it Forward
text: I do not pretend to give such a deed; I only lend it to you.
When you [... ] meet with another honest Man in similar Distress, you must pay me by lending this Sum to him;
enjoining him to discharge the Debt by a like operation, when he shall be able, and shall meet with another opportunity.
I hope it may thus go thro' many hands, before it meets with a Knave that will stop its Progress.
This is a trick of mine for doing a deal of good with a little money.
